message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm valuing the product at a higher price point. Could you consider $120?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think $110 is a fair price. Can you meet me at that price?
